Text:
Does not work on softmodded 4.1U, using Neogamma R8 rev17, neither on disc or through USB.

Took me 5 days of downloading and anticipation just to figure that out.

Worked very well on 4.2u soft-modded Wii using USB Loader GX.

Thanks for the upload, will be seeding.
why must all the good non-overrated games have so few seeders x_x

Thanks very much!
ありがとうございます！

@goldcaps, did you try loading the game with a different ios or from a usb loader other than neogamma? Monster Hunter Tri would freeze on me when i tried to start a new game until i selected a different ios to load from than the one i use for my other games.
